text: The Capitólio rock collapse happened on 8 January 2022 at Furnas Reservoir in Capitólio, Minas Gerais, Brazil. The rockfall killed 10 people and left 32 injured and three missing. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:2022 disasters Category:2020s disasters in South America Category:2022 in Brazil Category:January 2022 events Category:Minas Gerais
title: Capitólio rockfall
